EmailTemplate.name: LNS Youth Assessor Training Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Contact.FirstName} Youth Assessor Training is on Friday!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey there {!Contact.FirstName},
This is just a quick reminder about the Youth Assessor training on Friday 19th of February that you have signed up to attend. I am very much looking forward to seeing you there! When Friday 19th of February between 15:00 and 17:00. Please arrive for 14:45.
Where The Challenge, Elizabeth House, 39 York Road, London, SE1 7NQ.
By attending training you will become part of The Challenge's official Youth Assessor team and will help choose next years mentors and leaders!
We have a few spaces available so do encourage other NCS graduates to get involved in this fantastic opportunity!
You will also get:
***Training in public speaking, sales techniques and marketing***
***A FREE Ticket to our NCS Action Day Party on Saturday 5th of March**
***This opportunity also counts towards our graduate Awards scheme***
***Finally you will be entered into our half term events draw and could win a Beats Pill Portable Speaker!***
We will be providing some nibbles so if you haven't already let me know if you have any dietary requirements.
If you would like your travel costs reimbursed please ensure you bring a receipt.
Any questions please do ask!
I look forward to seeing you and HAPPY FRIDAY!
Ola Awosika
Graduate Associate Manager 07785623395
